import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const AddBike=_ref=>{let{onAdd}=_ref;const[bike,setBike]=useState({name:"",model:"",year:"",kilometers:"",purchaseDate:"",color:"",regNumber:"",engineNumber:"",chassisNumber:""});const handleChange=e=>{setBike({...bike,[e.target.name]:e.target.value});};const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!bike.name||!bike.model||!bike.kilometers||!bike.purchaseDate||!bike.color||!bike.regNumber){alert("Please fill all required fields.");return;}let existing=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("bikes")||"[]");existing.push(bike);localStorage.setItem("bikes",JSON.stringify(existing));alert("✅ Bike added!");if(onAdd)onAdd();// ✅ safe check for onAdd to prevent crash
};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,style:{padding:"20px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"\u2795 Add Bike"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"name",placeholder:"Bike Name",onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"model",placeholder:"Model",onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"year",placeholder:"Year",onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"kilometers",placeholder:"Kilometers Run",onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"purchaseDate",type:"date",onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"color",placeholder:"Color",onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"regNumber",placeholder:"Reg Number",onChange:handleChange,required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"engineNumber",placeholder:"Engine Number (optional)",onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{name:"chassisNumber",placeholder:"Chassis Number (optional)",onChange:handleChange}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Save Bike"})]});};export default AddBike;
